name: Happy path: a debt position is created and published in UAT environment
description:
Verify that after creating and publishing a debt position,
the RTP lookup returns exactly one entry for the notice number.
descriptionHtml:
Verify that after creating and publishing a debt position,
the RTP lookup returns exactly one entry for the notice number.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Expected 201 but got 403
assert 403 == 201
 +  where 403 = <Response [403]>.status_code
